domains.title: Domains or URLs
domains.description: List of camp domains or full URLs (e.g. example.com or https://example.com)

maxDepth.title: Max crawl depth
maxDepth.description: How deep to follow in-domain links from seed pages (0 = seeds only).

maxRequestsPerDomain.title: Max requests per domain
maxRequestsPerDomain.description: Upper limit on total fetched pages per domain to control cost.

pageKeywords.title: Priority page keywords
pageKeywords.description: Only follow same-domain links whose URL contains these keywords.

respectRobotsTxt.title: Respect robots.txt
respectRobotsTxt.description: If true, be conservative and avoid risky fetch behavior.

useApifyProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useApifyProxy.description: Enable Apify Proxy to reduce blocking (extra cost may apply).
